name: Photobucket Downloader
short_description:
This downloader was created off of Python 2.7.8.

To run the application, download the installer and run it. It will extract all files then you will be able to run the Photobucket Recents.exe file. The file runs in the command console.

The application will download all images found on the recent page of Photobucket, then reload the page and download the next set of images.

Each downloaded image that does not have "Ebay" in the title will be saved to a folder that will be created specifically for the date and hour that the image appeared. Filed with Ebay in the title will be separately downloaded to an Ebay folder.

The application checks for an existing copy of the image in the hourly folder, if it finds one then it will not download a new copy.
